content: @Lloyd McKenzie I captured your comments yesterday in a GitHub issue: https://github.com/HL7/ihe-sdc-ecc-on-fhir/issues/13 I tried my best to address them. Still have a few issues with the QA report. Need to make package-list.json, jira spec, and ignorewarnings.txt https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ihe-sdc-ecc-on-fhir/
